title: Cheese and bacon dip with Zambos plantain salsa verde
ingredients: Seasoned salt and pepper to taste
1 bag of Zambos Plantain Salsa Verde
instructions: Step 1. Place all ingredients in a bowl and mix.
Step 2. Place the cheese mixture in a bowl covered with plastic wrap and refrigerate for one hour.Place the cheese mixture in a bowl covered with plastic wrap and refrigerate for one hour.
Step 3. Remove from the refrigerator and remove the cheese mixture from the bowl and remove the plastic wrap.
Step 4. Garnish with Zambos Plantain Salsa Verde to your liking.
